data.name: Name of the sensor.
data.custom_consumption_pattern: (optional), add custom pattern as , separated list of values. e.g. 0.1,0.2 etc.
data.deduct_price: (optional) Deduct price from hourly cost, default 0
data.update_by: Choose if sensor should update every minute or every hour
data.calculate_by: Choose if sensor should calculate by start- or end-time

user.description: Add a Peaqnext-sensor, check the box to add another.
user.title: Add Sensors

error.invalid_path: The path provided is not valid. Should be in the format `user/repo-name` and should be a valid github repository.

init.title: Manage Repos

data.repos: Existing Repos: Uncheck any repos you want to remove.
data.path: New Repo: Path to the repository e.g. home-assistant-core
data.name: New Repo: Name of the sensor.

init.description: Remove existing repos or add a new repo.

custom_consumption_pattern.name: Custom consumption pattern
custom_consumption_pattern.description: The new custom consumption pattern (optional and only applies to sensors with custom_pattern)

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for the override (optional), in hours or as datetime
